00014 void ResourceMonitor::f_freeIndex(unsigned int i)
00015 {
00016     resource_monitor_entry Entry = m_resourceList[i];
00017 
00018     //Store a pointer to the entity
00019     void* Entity = Entry.m_Entity;
00020 
00021     //Remove it from the list
00022     m_resourceList.erase(m_resourceList.begin() + i);
00023 
00024     //Free the entity
00025     f_freeEntity(Entity);
00026 
00027     return;
00028 }

00030 void ResourceMonitor::f_addEntity(std::string Filename, void* Entity)
00031 {
00032     //Create a new resource entry
00033     resource_monitor_entry Entry;
00034     Entry.m_ResourceName = Filename;
00035     Entry.m_boundCount = 1;
00036 
00037     //Create the memory for the actual resource unit
00038     Entry.m_Entity = Entity;
00039 
00040     //Add it to the resources list
00041     m_resourceList.push_back(Entry);
00042 
00043     return;
00044 }

00046 void* ResourceMonitor::rmGetResource(std::string Resource)
00047 {
00048     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_resourceList.size(); i++)
00049     {
00050         if (m_resourceList[i].m_ResourceName.compare(Resource) == 0)
00051         {
00052             //Its the right resource
00053             m_resourceList[i].m_boundCount++;
00054             return m_resourceList[i].m_Entity;
00055         }
00056     }
00057 
00058     return f_loadEntity(Resource); //Not loaded, load it
00059 }
00060 
00061 void ResourceMonitor::rmReleaseResource(void* Resource)
00062 {
00063     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_resourceList.size(); i++)
00064     {
00065         if (m_resourceList[i].m_Entity == Resource)
00066         {
00067             m_resourceList[i].m_boundCount--;
00068 
00069             if (m_resourceList[i].m_boundCount == 0)
00070             {
00071                 printf("[RESOURCE_DEBUG] Entity 0x%lx removed from memory[/RESOURCE_DEBUG]\n", (unsigned long) Resource);
00072                 f_freeIndex(i);
00073             }
00074 
00075             return;
00076         }
00077     }
00078 }
